Text: EMail AddressKevin Benjamins email address is

RE Final Exhibit A Cc Stacy I owe you lunch Thanks for the quick exact and consistent help you continue to provide me Original Message From Dickson Stacy E Sent Wednesday October PM To Jones David Subject RE Final Exhibit A Congratulations Original Message From Jones David Sent Wednesday October PM To UCOM Cc Vickers Frank W Little Kelli Dickson Stacy E Subject Final Exhibit A This transaction is done Thanks for the business We will talk regarding a definitive contract beginning Thursday morning I hope that I was able to provide you the type of service you deserve I will begin working on the TGP EOL structure as well File Exhibit A of the Letter Agreement dated doc

RE Virginia Natural Gas Payment for Due Cc I just spoke to Denise Dotson She is going to call me back after she visits with Beth White Denise is unclear as to why funds are being withheld I will let you know her response THX Original Message From Baxter Bryce Sent Tuesday November PM To Rohauer Tanya Hodge Jeffrey T Cc Vickers Frank Jones David Reeves Leslie Dhont Margaret Subject Virginia Natural Gas Payment for Due Importance High Per our conversations with Tony Walden at VNG Tony has been instructed not to release any funds to Enron per Beth White VP Controller of AGL AGL is the parent of VNG I will be out of the office on Wednesday but if you need any more information from Settlements please contact Margaret Dhont at Heres the blow by blow Tuesday am Tony Walden VNG told Kay Khan settlements coordinator for ENA that he had the payment set up in their system to pay ENA but that per Beth White VP Controller of AGL no payments were to be released to Enron Around Bryce Baxter contacted Beth White to find out what the issues were that would prevent payment Left message Tuesday pm Around Bryce Baxter called Beth White again and spoke with her secretary Her secretary said she would send Beth a text page and would call back as soon as possible but havent received return call yet Around Bryce Baxter called Beth again and left another message Kay Khan also called Tony Walden again and left another message letting him know we hadnt received a call back from Beth White David Jones has also called a couple of his Commercial counterparts at VNGAGL today but was not able to get a response I tried to talk to David tonight so I could give you specific names but was unable to reach him

Summary Exit Entitlements Granted by Yankee Cc Jay the spreadsheet has a summary of the exit and operational entitlements that TETCO has provided Enron that Yankee has granted Assuming that you do not wish to modify the two smaller release offers I have provided you exactly what needs to be done to modify the larger release offer It is important that the releases grant us the minimal exit entitlements by production zone to M per our previous conversations I will be out of the office on Monday However Judy Townsend and Ruth Concannon are familiar with this deal structure Judy is most familiar with the current issues I will be visiting with Ruth early on Monday Judy gets to the office earlier than Ruth She will be able to answer any questions However she trades until AM CST so she will not be able to spend as much time with you in the morning I will give you a call from the road around AM We will get this done togetherThanks

Summary of Entitlements Revised Disregard Previous Email Cc Jay this spreadsheet has a summary of the exit and operational entitlements that TETCO has provided Enron that Yankee granted Assuming that you do not wish to modify the two smaller release offers and I have provided you exactly what needs to be done to modify the larger release offer It is important that the releases grant us the minimal exit entitlements by production zone to M as well as M to M M to M as noted in Exhibit A I will be working in NY on Monday However Judy Townsend and Ruth Concannon are familiar with this deal structure Judy is most familiar with the current issues I will be visiting with Ruth early on Monday In the meantime Judy can answer any questions Judy tends to be busy trading until AM CST She may not be able to spend as much time with you in the morning However Ruth will be able to assist if Judy is busy I will give you a call from the road around AM We will get this done togetherThanks
JD IrvingForwarded by David JonesNAEnron on PM From Sanjeev nronXgate on PM To David NRON cc Subject JD Irving This is what I have skk
